channel.title: Workshops on Edmonton Go
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Edmonton Go

item.title: Introduction to Go Workshop
item.description: William Kennedy On January 24, 2015 we will be hosting a Go Workshop taught by William Kennedy of GoingGo.net, co-author of Go in Action and trainer extraordinaire. What You Will Learn The day will cover the following material: Language and Syntax Arrays, Slices and Maps Methods, Interfaces and Embedding Types Concurrency and Channels Schedule The workshop starts at 9:00 am sharp and ends at 5 pm. Come 30 minutes early if you need help setting up a Go environment.
